title: EBMARYAM
author: EBMARYAM
content: I have always been fascinated seeing people making it in crypto space. I'm kind of surrounded by people that are really into crypto but I have this mindset that until you have capital before you venture into crypto and make a success. This is why I haven't ventured into the space, but with good guide I believe I can make it as well.As a new person that wants to make it in crypto, what safety guidelines and advices can you give to see him/her to success with minimal risks?

comments.author: Zaguru12
comments.body: Been surrounded with crypto investors is an advantage because you could easily get firsthand about the whole thing. Just like you said bitcoin requires capital and patience, also have the mindset that bitcoin isn’t a quick get rich scheme. Although with proper understanding of its trading you could make profits from it. The most important advice on crypto space is to invest an amount you can lose, this advice is because bitcoin and crypto in general is volatile. As a beginner to minimize risk stick only to bitcoin holding, investing into Altcoins are only profitable to experience trader’s because it is more of pump and dump coins, so to invest in it is risky for a beginner Also do not quit your job to focus on crypto trading only

comments.author: Agbe
comments.body: You are welcome to the bitcoin world. It is only those who are persevered making it in the bitcoin world and not for those parochial participants. Since you are surrounded with crypto enthusiast then you have the advantage to learn more from physical and also from the forum and if only you are sincerely tell us your mind. If you like readingUnofficial list of (official) Bitcointalk.org rules, guidelines, FAQThat is the first guide in the forum. So follow up.

comments.author: Upgrade00
comments.body: If you currently lack capital to invest, you can learn a digital skill which puts you in a position to get paid in Bitcoin. You grow your portfolio through regular purchases and get an alternate means of earning an income. But if I'm being honest, earnun to get paid in Bitcoin required time and attention, and sometimes capital to pay for the skill set.Quote from: EBMARYAM on May 20, 2023, 06:27:16 PMAs a new person that wants to make it in crypto, what safety guidelines and advices can you give to see him/her to success with minimal risks?• Learn the basics,• Do not rush into anything,• Understand how to secure your wallets,• Also understand that Bitcoin is not a get rich quick scheme,• Stick to Bitcoin if you're looking for stability.

comments.body: Quote from: EBMARYAM on May 20, 2023, 06:27:16 PMI have always been fascinated seeing people making it in crypto space. This is why I haven't ventured into the space, but with good guide I believe I can make it as well.As a new person that wants to make it in crypto, what safety guidelines and advices can you give to see him/her to success with minimal risks?You can learn crypto without investing, I think that’s the best way to start one’s crypto career. Some bitcoin books to read are; Mastering Bitcoin (GitHub)The Internet of MoneyMastering EthereumThere is a lot of hype and fake lifestyle that’s being portrayed by people in the crypto in a bid to look successful. The best advice I received as newbies was “be skeptical of the hype”, this simple advice saved me from investing in altcoins even if they were promoted by the biggest celebrity or even if everyone is saying it’s going to be the next best thing after bitcoin.

comments.author: BIT-BENDER
comments.body: You want to survive in crypto-currency with minimal risk yes it's possible even though there is always an element of risk in this space (crypto) but you can actually reduce it.#Avoid altcoins if you can: altcoins are crypto-currencies that aren't Bitcoin, any other coin asides Bitcoin is an alternative coin, this side of crypto has a high percentage of risk and uncertainty, there are lots of altcoins and this can really mess with your choices, the are pump and dump and this can be an investors trap hole. So generally if you want to reduce your risk and you willing then you can try avoiding altcoins.#Greed: the biggest tool scammers uses to get victims, greed is a potential risk in crypto-currency. It set people up to fall for scams, set traders and investors up to fall into loses as well.#Low knowledge: you can't make it in anything you don't know about, Crypto-currency should not just be a gamble. Try to learn new things here, it can also here in protecting you in this ecosystem.

comments.author: Awaklara
comments.body: Quote from: EBMARYAM on May 20, 2023, 06:27:16 PMAs a new person that wants to make it in crypto, what safety guidelines and advices can you give to see him/her to success with minimal risks?you may be able to have a good circle of friends and have good communication to discuss Bitcoin. but remember, not all of them can also be shared with them. keep your boundaries and privacy that you can't share with anyone. Your environment may be your greatest risk.One more thing, if you store assets in a wallet, don't be too open to connecting your wallet with any site. most beginners are too eager to seek information related to crypto. and many scam sites that you will encounter.

comments.author: Forever101
comments.body: You have heard from the experienced on what to do. Before investing , do well to dive into what it means and how it works so that all your focus won't be in profit profit profit. This will help you balance your thinking and not over loaded with the thought of loss or gain. As you have heard from others, invest what you can afford to loose in other to maintain good standard of living without posting risk to your life.  Another pitfall to avoid in this journey is greediness,knowing when to enter and when to exit the market for profit maximization. If your investment is majorly on bitcoins, Good! But if you have others in mind, be ware of scammers

This is why I haven't ventured into the space, but with good guide I believe I can make it as well.You can always venture into cryptocurrency even without capital.  There are other means of engaging with cryptocurrency that does not need financial capital.  Like offering services and working as free lancer and accepting cryptocurrency as payment/salary.  Cryptocurrency isn't only about investment.  Since there is a community and economics, there will be lots of options to participate in cryptocurrency.Quote from: EBMARYAM on May 20, 2023, 06:27:16 PMAs a new person that wants to make it in crypto, what safety guidelines and advices can you give to see him/her to success with minimal risks?You must educate yourself about cryptocurrency, its  basic technicality and economics.  Always verify information before believing it and avoid any get rich scheme proposition.

If your mindset is to get rich very quick, you might not succeed in this very space.I can see it is because of the success of your friends, who live around you that makes you to join the cryptocurrency earlier than you planned.You might not know if your friends have other sources of income other than cryptocurrency, but they would make you feel that they get their money all from crypto. To be honest, invest more of your time in learning how Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies work before you can invest your money. It is good that you have a steady source of income, and then br investing according to your budget, That is the best way to break through in the cryptocurrency industry.

comments.author: boyptc
comments.body: Welcome here, I think you've got already a good start by having those peers that will guide you. Didn't you ask them for ways without having the need of starting big or with having no money? The risk won't change for everybody and there's no exception on it. And there's no guaranteed that even you start with a capital, your success isn't assured. The best approach is to start little and then learn the market as if you have no option since you've placed your money already. Dollar cost averaging(DCA) will be suggested to you by many and take note of how you do it. You can start with as little as you can while testing the waters until you've got enough of it and ready to venture more with your additional capital.

You can't just start up with a huge amount like all your savings and expect a bigger profit, well you can be lucky but to be on the safer side start with a small capital. Try to understand the mechanism of buying, selling and exchanging cryptocurrency before investing. Don't just jump into any crypto exchanges, look for a trustworthy crypto exchange.

comments.author: Onset
comments.body: Stick with Bitcoin. Forget about altcoins until you feel like you’re actually legitimately ready for them. Altcoins are like a ride or die thingy. This strategy alone will save like over 90% of the risks a normal crypto investor goes through.By the way, you don’t need a lot of capital to begin. By waiting until you have more capital, you’re wasting time and opportunities. You’ll be basically left behind because you thought you need to be wealthy to start. Nobody became wealthy by having wealth, unless they inherited it.

comments.body: Quote from: EBMARYAM on May 20, 2023, 06:27:16 PMI have always been fascinated seeing people making it in crypto space. I'm kind of surrounded by people that are really into crypto but I have this mindset that until you have capital before you venture into crypto and make a success. For those looking to earn significantly from the cryptocurrency market, capital is, in my opinion, the most crucial factor.There are other ways to succeed in the cryptocurrency world as well, but the ideal approach is to have your own money. However, before you start investing in the cryptocurrency market, try to learn more about Bitcoin and cryptocurrencies in general. As a beginner, I can only advise you to invest in bitcoin first and steer clear of all other cryptocurrencies, as many of them are worth investing in nothing but trash. This is because beginners may lack the information necessary to do their own thorough study to identify the best coins or tokens out all existing altcoins. Quote from: EBMARYAM on May 20, 2023, 06:27:16 PMAs a new person that wants to make it in crypto, what safety guidelines and advices can you give to see him/her to success with minimal risks?Make sure you have proper knowledge about cryptocurrency industry, don't be greedy to invest more than what you cannot afford to lose, always ask about any thing you don't understand about crypto industry especially coming to forum to seek for guidance,don't click on any links you don't know it sources because crypto industry is full of scammers.

comments.author: mamesso
comments.body: The main capital for success in the crypto world is not money, but knowledge. Luckily you are around people who love crypto and are knowledgeable about crypto. You can learn to fly step by step, the people in the forum will help you ventured into the space as you wish. Here you can find knowledge-enhancing guides to achieve success in the crypto world, keep reading for a deep dive into the foundational knowledge that can help you fly even higher.Don't rush to become successful in the crypto world, you also need to consider all the risks that will occur. Money as support to start investing, without capitalizing on your knowledge you can be at risk of losing all of its value.
